description: Charming yellow house with a white picket fence and a garden gnome collection.
Sidewalk cracks where grass pushes through, leading to a slightly overgrown flower bed.
Community notice board plastered with colorful flyers about local events and lost pets.
Small café with outdoor seating, the aroma of freshly brewed coffee wafts through the air.
Cafe's sidewalk café tables, a newspaper left open to the sports section.
Breezy courtyard with a few small shops, colorful awnings fluttering in the wind.
Modern office building with large glass windows reflecting the skyline.
Busy intersection with a taxi stand and pedestrians waiting at a crosswalk.
Old warehouse with rusted metal siding, a faded mural of a factory scene on the side.
